comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Here is a NY Times Article about F. W. Rubien, being "Frederick W. Rubien, Secretary-Treasurer of the Amateur Athletic Union of the United States". There are many additional mentions of Frederick W. Rubien in NY Times articles from that time period.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: AAU post held 1914-1927, Officer of the American Olympic Committee starting in 1914. archive.wmlnj.org/TheWestfieldLeader/1939/1939-02-02/pg_0... He seems best known now for his support, as secretary of the American Olympic Committee, of Avery Brundage's endorsement of the exclusion of Jews from the 1936 Berlin Olympics.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: bior and artolog: Thanks for pointing us to more information about Rubien.  We'll include some of it in the description next time we update.
